entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 11:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
